Keywords: Fantastic Four , Latveria , Scientist
Real Name: Valeria Richards
Special Powers
LET'S SEE, WHAT CAN I MAKE WITH THIS?: FREE: Choose a standard attack power. Valeria Richards can use that power this turn.
HERE, UNCLE, I BUILT THIS FOR YOU: Perplex with a range of 8. UNIQUE MODIFIER - When Valeria Richards uses Perplex to target another character that shares a keyword, she may instead modify a value except damage by +2.
